readme:
# invert-kv > Invert the key/value of an object. Example: `{foo: 'bar'}` â†’ `{bar: 'foo'}` ## Install ``` $ npm install invert-kv ``` ## Usage ```js import invertKeyValue from 'invert-kv'; invertKeyValue({foo: 'bar', 'ðŸ¦„': 'ðŸŒˆ'}); //=> {bar: 'foo', 'ðŸŒˆ': 'ðŸ¦„'} ``` ---
